Trade/Device Name(s): Binax NOW ⊗ Legionella Urinary Antigen Test
Submitter Information: Binax, Inc. d/b/a Inverness Medical Professional Diagnostics
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BinaxNOW Legionella Urinary Antigen rapid immunochromatographic assay for detection of L. pneumophila serogroup 1 antigen in urine
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of Legionella pneumophila serogroup 1 antigen in urine specimens from patients with symptoms of pneumonia to aid in presumptive diagnosis of Legionella infection (Legionnaires' disease) in conjunction with culture and other methods.
